title: Watcher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Watch a player at night, granting them invincible defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The following day, if 1/3 of living players (rounded up) votes the watched target, the target will be instantly hanged.
- Targets will be notified that they have been watched.
- You may watch yourself.

desc:
Post 439
*Nothing will come to harm them. For tonight, at least.*
